messages.title: IT'S TIME TO BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: For too many people, things aren’t working as they should be... Jo Swinson said, 'We have an ambitious plan to future proof our country... ensure every single person can fulfil their potential.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats promise to stop Brexit and build a brighter future for everyone.
Leading the fight to Stop Brexit.
Cut NHS waiting times, tackle the climate emergency, drive up performance in our schools.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson's Conservatives, Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party

issues.brexitEurope: Leading the fight to Stop Brexit.
issues.education: Drive up performance in our schools.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jo Swinson said, 'We have an ambitious plan to future proof our country...'
